comprehensive_overview: Molden is a molecular visualization program specifically designed for the display and analysis of molecular structures. It provides various tools for visualizing molecular orbitals, electron densities, and other properties of chemical systems.
core_features: Molden allows users to visualize molecular structures in 3D, display molecular orbitals, electron densities, and electrostatic potential maps, analyze vibrational modes and frequencies, and perform various types of molecular calculations.
